dockerfile.description: Relative path to the Dockerfile used to build this container.

context.description: The build context for the container. This defaults to the directory containing the dockerfile.

args.description: A map containing entries to be passed to --build-arg when building the container.

title: Service
description: Metadata necessary to build and deploy a service from source.

requires.description: A list of any services required for this service to function.

containers.description: A list of containers that form this service. If this is not supplied then any Dockerfile is assumed.
